## BlockDragger.updateCursorDuringBlockDrag\_() method

Update the cursor (and possibly the trash can lid) to reflect whether the dragging block would be deleted if released immediately.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected updateCursorDuringBlockDrag_(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
